meaningMnemonic: <radical>Gold</radical> is not the <radical>same</radical> as <kanji>copper</kanji>. They are two different metals. Gold is not the same as copper.
readingMnemonic: Smashing the <kanji>copper</kanji> against the gold has made you tired. You should eat a <reading>dou</reading>ghnut (どう). Go get yourself a doughnut.
